Features Large, easy-to-read display with readings that can be seen across the room; Indoor and outdoor temperature readings; Daily high and low records for indoor and outdoor temperature that reset at midnight; AcuRite Wireless Weather Station with Large Display, Atomic Clock, and Hyperlocal Forecast; Hyperlocal, personal weather forecast 12 hours from your current conditions; Measures outdoor temperatures from -40 ?F to 158 ?F (-40 ?C to 70 ?C); Measures indoor temperatures from 32 ?F to 122 ?F (0 ?C to 50?); Atomic clock and calendar set themselves to the correct time and date with split-second precision
